subject: [PATCH 5/5] arm64: mm: implement the architecture-specific test_and_clear_young_ptes()

reviews.author: Rik van Riel
reviews.summary: Raised a minor concern about an infinite loop in the patch's loop conditional, suggesting it be modified to avoid this issue.

2026-02-25.patch_summary: The patch adds a batched helper to clear the young flag for large folios.
